job_role_details.job_description: Build and scale cloud-first products like Jira, Confluence, and Bitbucket. Responsibilities include designing backend services, writing high-quality code, participating in design reviews, improving system reliability, and collaborating with cross-functional teams in an Agile environment.
job_role_details.bonus: Joining bonus, annual performance bonus, RSUs
job_role_details.benefits_summary: Comprehensive health insurance, flexible work policy, paid parental leave, wellness allowance, stock options

skill_sets.typical_questions: Find the longest consecutive sequence in an array; Detect a cycle in a linked list; Solve a dynamic programming problem on strings
Implement rate limiter logic; Write code to validate parentheses; Process input to simulate task scheduling
Logical reasoning based on constraints; Basic probability puzzle; Analytical question on efficiency
Explain time complexity trade-offs; Solve a graph traversal problem; Implement binary tree level order traversal
Explain multithreading and concurrency issues; What is deadlock; Difference between process and thread
Basics of HTTP and REST APIs; What happens when an API request fails; Explain latency vs throughput
Design a collaborative document editing system; Design a task tracking system like Jira; How would you handle scaling and fault tolerance
Design an object-oriented notification system; Explain design patterns you have used; How do you ensure modularity
What is code maintainability; How do you approach refactoring; Explain CI/CD practices
Describe a time you received critical feedback; How do you work in distributed teams; Why Atlassian and its values resonate with you

job_role_details.job_description: Develop intuitive, high-performance user interfaces for Atlassian products using modern frontend frameworks. Work closely with designers and backend engineers to deliver accessible, scalable, and responsive web experiences.
job_role_details.bonus: Annual performance bonus and stock grants
job_role_details.benefits_summary: Health insurance, remote work flexibility, learning budget, wellness programs, RSUs

skill_sets.typical_questions: Implement a responsive dashboard layout; Write JavaScript to debounce a function; Manipulate DOM elements efficiently
Optimize array and string operations; Explain space-time tradeoffs; Implement a simple caching mechanism
Component-based design principles; How would you design a reusable UI library; Explain state management approaches
How do you ensure accessibility; Performance optimization techniques; Testing strategies for frontend applications
Explain a complex UI feature you built; Collaborating with designers; Handling user feedback
Why Atlassian; How do you align with Atlassian values; Long-term career aspirations
